full_summary:
Pistol Replacement
=====================

### Title

* Eng: Pistol Replacement
* Fra: Remplacement des pistolets

### Reference Number

* PW-BM-044-29157

### Solicitation Number

* 87055-221076/A

### Publication and Closing Dates

* Publication Date: 2023-09-04
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-11T14:00:00

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Delivery Regions

* Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* End User: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission

### Contact Information

* Francisco Mejia De La Rosa
* Phone: (343) 541-7284
* Email: [francisco.mejiadelarosa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francisco.mejiadelarosa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) requires the replacement of its existing fleet of sidearms. The tender is open to all interested suppliers, and the selection criteria is based on the lowest price. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Deliveries will take place in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

### Attachments

Documents related to this tender announcement can be found on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Please note that the attachments are in both English and French.
